--- In nbwrpg@y..., "rudra656" <Rudra656@a...> wrote:
> ::Aerotaur::
>      Aerotaur lands next to him and returns to his centaur mode.  
He 
> analyzes the signal for a moment and commits a copy of it to his 
> memory.  "Hey, I can't even remember my name.  I have no idea that 
> group that signal is from but I do have an idea."  He looks at the 
> pod more closely.  "Alright here's what we do.  First we drag the 
pod 
> into a clearing.  Then we should be able to make it transmit it's 
> signal onver a long distance.  Then we can see who answers it."
> 
>

> >

this?"said

I

of

at
